title: Looking to Duo
body:
Hi all I'm currently looking for a duo, I'm currently playing on a bronze 3 account which is not my main, and have some other smurfs which I am playing some ranked on, my main is was gold 5 now is silver 1, if you would like to add me onto one of my accounts 
: Wolfiehunter
 I will play most games on this account as i am trying to get it into silver or gold.
I currently main adc but I'm able to support, and am good at the other roles but those are my two first preferred
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Im interested man im a sup in s5
ill send you a friend request
